communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: MCS VK 2 4.1.24
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of body cam footage from the arrest of Vitallii Kovalev, also possibly known as Vitalii Kovalev and Vitaly Kovalev. Mr. Kovalev was arrested on June 16, 2020. His arrest number is MCSO20ARR002460 and offense number MCSO20OFF003605. The arresting officer was Ty Torres.

This footage was previously released to CBS News, and aired on its news magazine program 60 Minutes on Sunday, March 31, 2024. As this footage has already been displayed publicly by a major news network, there should be no additional concerns for releasing it to the public.

Verification of the public display of the footage can be found on 60 Minutes' YouTube channel. Please see the following link, beginning at 5:00: https://youtu.be/JdPSD1SUYCY?si=UrAQyCQvt9U4S0Tn

I am asking you waive any fees associated with this request. I am a member of the news media. My bylines, which include Unicorn Riot, Covert Action Magazine, and the Geopolitical Economy Report, can be found in both print and electronic publications. I am sending this request in coordination with Muckrock, an award-winning and nationally-recognized news organization.

This request is not being made for commercial purposes.

All documents will be provided to the general public without charge.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Robert Skvarla, Jr.
